Package factorization

Class Node_Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • factorization.Node_Connector
  • public class Node_Connector
extends Object
    This class is responsible for connecting the nodes and creating the graph structure. The static variables of this class have to be set prior to using it.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int branch
      For T-DP, we need to know the number of branches of the parent.
      static String problem_setting
      "DP" or "T-DP".

    • Method Detail

      • create_intermediate_node

        public static State_Node create_intermediate_node​(String intermediate_string)
        Creates a new intermediate node.
        Parameters:
        A - string identifier for the new node.
        Returns:
        State_Node The new node.

      • connect_left_to_intermediate

        public static State_Node connect_left_to_intermediate​(List<? extends State_Node> left,
                                                      State_Node right,
                                                      String intermediate_string)
        Connects a layer of nodes belonging to a (parent/left) relation to an intermediate node. If the intermediate node doesn't already exist, instantiates a new one and returns it.
        Parameters:
        left - The parent/left layer of nodes that act as the source.
        right - The intermediate node that acts as the target.
        intermediate_string - A string for the intermediate node (if one of the first two arguments is null).
        Returns:
        State_Node The new intermediate node materialized from this method (can be null if no node is materialized).

      • connect_intermediate_to_right

        public static State_Node connect_intermediate_to_right​(State_Node left,
                                                       List<? extends State_Node> right,
                                                       String intermediate_string)
        Connects an intermediate node to a layer of nodes belonging to a (child/right) relation. If the intermediate node doesn't already exist, instantiates a new one and returns it.
        Parameters:
        left - The intermediate node that acts as the source.
        right - The child/right layer of nodes that act as the target.
        intermediate_string - A string for the intermediate node (if one of the first two arguments is null).
        Returns:
        State_Node The new intermediate node materialized from this method (can be null if no node is materialized).

      • connect_intermediate_nodes

        public static State_Node connect_intermediate_nodes​(State_Node left,
                                                    State_Node right,
                                                    String intermediate_string)
        Connects an intermediate node to another itermediate node. If the intermediate nodes don't already exist, instantiates new ones and returns them. Returns the target node if both are materialized.
        Parameters:
        left - The intermediate node that acts as the source.
        right - The intermediate node that acts as the target.
        intermediate_string - A string for the intermediate node (if one of the first two arguments is null).
        Returns:
        State_Node The new intermediate node materialized from this method (can be null if no node is materialized).
